workExperience.description: Conducted customer segmentation analysis using K-Means and PCA on large datasets. Automated weekly reporting with Python and SQL, and built Tableau dashboards to support marketing strategies.
Provided technical consulting for retail clients, analyzing business data to optimize operations. Designed data-driven solutions and supported client projects with actionable insights.
Assisted in managing the product lifecycle for a mobile app, gathering user feedback, defining requirements, and coordinating development and launch activities.

projectExperience.description: Led a team to analyze customer behavior and sales trends, identified key sales drivers, and proposed optimization strategies for an e-commerce platform.
Developed a personal finance app integrating real-time stock data APIs and budgeting tools, enhancing the UI/UX for better user engagement.

education.description: Relevant coursework included Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, SQL for Data Science, and Software Engineering Principles.
